issue.title: web122.faselhd.cafe
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://web122.faselhd.cafe/movies/%d9%81%d9%8a%d9%84%d9%85-hunger-games-mockingjay-part-2-2015-%d9%85%d8%aa%d8%b1%d8%ac%d9%85-n](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fweb122.faselhd.cafe%2Fmovies%2F%25d9%2581%25d9%258a%25d9%2584%25d9%2585-hunger-games-mockingjay-part-2-2015-%25d9%2585%25d8%25aa%25d8%25b1%25d8%25ac%25d9%2585-n) ### Comment > this site have too many domains and if you were out side of my country it will redirect you to faselhd.express and i don't know if adguard add it to its list or not but if you please add a script for *.faselhd.* it would help alot cause every day this site change its first domain ex today it is (web122.faselhd.cafe) yesterday it was (web121.faselhd.cafe) they only changed one number in domain name to avoid detect by my goverment dns black list...sorry for bad english and for making it long Username: `@EslamGamalEssa` ### [NSFW] Screenshots

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://outlook.live.com/mail/0/inbox/id/AQMkADAwATM3ZmYAZS1iNDAwAC05OQAxMi0wMAItMDAKAEYAAAPlCMM06kH%2BQLGrhBzsFhvcBwDPYene0SwxRIcq4kD0eaBWAAACAQwAAADPYene0SwxRIcq4kD0eaBWAAefDhT0AAAA](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Foutlook.live.com%2Fmail%2F0%2Finbox%2Fid%2FAQMkADAwATM3ZmYAZS1iNDAwAC05OQAxMi0wMAItMDAKAEYAAAPlCMM06kH%252BQLGrhBzsFhvcBwDPYene0SwxRIcq4kD0eaBWAAACAQwAAADPYene0SwxRIcq4kD0eaBWAAefDhT0AAAA) ### Comment > There is a display issue with outlook.live.com when using the "AdGuard Base Filter" (see screenshots) with AdGuard for Windows or the "AdGuard - Ads" filter in uBlock Origin (tested in Edge, Chrome, Brave and Firefox). When the filter is enabled and the Calendar/To Do pane is turned on, the pane overlays the open mail pane. When the filter is disabled, this does not happen. Nothing relevant appears to be blocked in the logs and disabling AdGuard from the browser assistant for outlook.live.com does not resolve the problem. Only disabling the filter resolves the issue. ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/1z4qmcd7xtk0kco04goggkggg0w04wc49wz3sztxnu.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/tspl43k18y88008wckck400444w44gwcausgxikn14.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.16.0 (4542) Browser: | brave 120.0.0.0 License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `quic://12j62f0q11j.dns.controld.com`
Filters: | Ad Blocking:
